entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. High minus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
